attributes.action: Hand over the formula for the Covid vaccination to poorer countries now.
attributes.additional_details: It would show the world that Britain is still great.
attributes.background: I want my government to stop patting themselves on the back for sending out our leftover vaccines. I want my government to handover our Astrazeneca formula to other countries so that they can make it for themselves.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Astrazeneca to decide. You might start a petition asking the Government to encourage companies to share vaccine manufacturing intelligence more widely. Or, you might be interested to sign this petition instead: 

Increase donations of and funding for COVID 19 vaccines to developing countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596403
